content:
It was a pleasure conducting the technical round of the job interview with you, Jeyachandran. Based on the resume and our conversation, I believe you have demonstrated strong skills and experience in areas such as full-stack development, data structures, and AI.

I will now summarize your performance and make my recommendations to the team. Please note that these ratings are subjective and based on our interview today.

**Communication Skills:** 8/10
**Technical Skills:** 9/10
**Problem-Solving Ability:** 8.5/10
**Creativity:** 8.5/10

I would like to inform you that we will be in touch soon to let you know the next steps. Thank you again for taking the time to interview with us today, and I wish you the best of luck in your job search endeavors.

Do you have any questions or concerns, Jeyachandran? (Remember, I won't ask you to ask me any questions.)

Thank you, Jeyachandran. I believe we have covered all the necessary topics during this technical round of the interview. I want to thank you for sharing your experiences and skills with me today.

As we conclude the interview, let me just confirm that we will be in touch with you soon to discuss the next steps. We appreciate the time you took to chat with us today, and we wish you the best of luck with your job search.

I think that's all for today. Thank you again, Jeyachandran. Goodbye!
It was nice chatting with you, Jeyachandran.
